overview_of_class: In the course participants will gain an understanding of the cognitive foundations of reading comprehension and their influence on methods of instruction and assessment, as well as the interrelationships between reading processes and language learning.
name: Elementary Literacy Methods and Content
title: SESP MS_ED 423-0-20 Elementary Literacy Methods and Content
